Player History
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 4/3/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/9/1985 with a Jammed Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/10/1985, off Tom Browning (CIN)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Diego on 8/28/1986...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,078,571 through salary arbitration...
Hit 3 homeruns against Chicago, driving in 7 runs on 6/9/1987...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,721,429 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/1988, hitting .556 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,721,429 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Atlanta to Detroit on 4/26/1989 (Going to ATL: C Matt Nokes, 1B Will Clark. Going to DET: P Tom Glavine, P Chris Hammond, C Jerry Willard, LF Glenn Wilson, 1B Larry Sheets)...
10/10/1989: Signed a contract extension with Detroit, $5,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/1990, hitting .440 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
